name: I Don't Have A Cue! (Demo)
description:
Hailey is a biochem major who volunteers as a makeup artist for college productions. She has a crush on one of the actors, Shana. Unfortunately, Shana has been giving her mixed signals at best. Is Hailey missing something?

Shana is a lit major who loves doing theater. She always participates as an actor in her college's productions. She has autism, and because of that she hasn't even realised Hailey has been flirting with her this whole time. 

Glimpse at interactions between the two girls from both of their perspectives.

I Don't Have A Clue! was made for Queerly Represent Me Jam 2018, and it is a group effort by Benny, Draz and Yareah.

It is currently a Demo.
